notes: Excellent Jupiter Ace support; described as perfect emulation; supports RAM packs up to 51KB; Speaker and Soundbox sound
MAME machine name: jupace; emulation status rated GOOD; save states supported

column12: Windows-only; also emulates ZX80/ZX81/ZX Spectrum; includes WAV loader; libretro core (81-libretro) exists but Jupiter Ace not yet implemented in it
